snippet: It’s college application season, and The New York Times is at Topeka High School in Kansas, following seniors as they decide where to apply — and whether college is even the right choice for them. Follow along as we introduce you to students i...
lead_paragraph: It’s college application season, and The New York Times is at Topeka High School in Kansas, following seniors as they decide where to apply — and whether college is even the right choice for them. Follow along as we introduce you to students in live Facebook chats, and bring in experts to talk through some major issues for families facing this often confusing process.

headline.main: College Is the Goal. Will These Three Teenagers Get There?
